name: Common Vision
slogan: Detoxifying politics and revitalising the arts of public diplomacy
description: Through research, events and publications we work towards a new kind of civic politics which moves beyond angry, binary debates, and unites people around long-term intergenerational goals.

jobs.title: Events and Communications co-ordinator
jobs.description:
The Events and Communications co-ordinator will deliver content and events which promote positive, aspirational ideas about the future of society, the economy and public life.

 

Key responsibilities:

*Planning and delivery of our external facing communications including written, audio-visual and other creative outputs

*Co-ordinating our presence on social media and channels/ platforms for our published content

*Programming and executing a varied schedule of events

*Liaising with high profile speakers and contributors including Parliamentarians, public commentators, and business/civil society leaders

*Building and maintaining positive relationships with partners, funders and wider stakeholders including professionals, campaigners, public commentators, Parliamentarians and academics

*Project management and administration
 

Candidate specification:

*Proactive, versatile individual who is comfortable working at a fast pace in a start-up environment

*Relevant professional experience of copywriting, organising events, producing and editing web materials, social media (at least two of)

*Strong verbal and written communication skills

*Impeccable administrative and organisational skills, and a keen eye for detail

*A conscientious and flexible work ethic

*A creative flair in identifying, developing and promoting new ideas


Further details here: http://www.covi.org.uk/communications-and-events-co-ordinator/

jobs.title: Operations Manager/ Head of Operations
jobs.description:
The Operations Manager/ Head of Operations will oversee the development of Common Vision's internal operations and help implement the delivery of a wide range of events and projects.

This newly created role encompasses a range of varied activities that are crucial to the organisation’s growth and sustainability. We are looking for an experienced individual to take on responsibilities relating to:

*Events management – Overseeing the delivery and logistics of a busy programme of public and professional events

*Finances – Monitoring project budgets and organisational cashflow; working with the director to prepare management accounts and planning funding targets

*Communications – Ensuring strong external communications with current and potential partners; administering updates to the contact database; overseeing the drafting and publishing of website content, newsletters and social media campaigns

*Fundraising and business development – Identifying to funding opportunities; cultivating relationships with project partners; approaching commercial and charitable sources; and developing other new business opportunities

*HR and office management – Maintaining relevant software and IT systems; overseeing staff recruitment, onboarding and training; managing office policies and procedures

*Impact and evaluation – Monitoring and measuring the success of our activities; overseeing project evaluations and impact strategies

Further details and candidate specification available here: http://www.covi.org.uk/vacancy-operations-manager/
